author: makortel
body:
#### PR description:

As a follow-up to my question in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/48656#discussion_r2246509365 this PR explores the impact of passing the type information via `edm::TypeID` instead of
* string for class name
* string for friendly class name
* `edm::TypeWithDict` object (that is replaced with `edm::TypeWithDict::byName(className)` in the constructor)

Resolves https://github.com/cms-sw/framework-team/issues/1507

#### PR validation:

Unit tests pass
title: [RFC] Pass type information only via `edm::TypeID` in `ProductDescription` constructor
